article.title: GT version Migrating Guide for MyProxy
article.para: The following provides available information about migrating from previous versions of the Globus Toolkit.

section.title: Migrating MyProxy from GT2
section.para: No special procedures are required for MyProxy installations migrating from GT2 to GT4. MyProxy is backward compatible.

section.title: Migrating MyProxy from GT3
section.para: No special procedures are required for MyProxy installations migrating from GT3 to GT4. MyProxy is backward compatible.
